activeSensorPhysicalDimensions.description: Height and width of the active area of the camera sensor in microns

activeSensorResolution.description: Photosite resolution of the active area of the camera sensor in pixels

anamorphicSqueeze.description:
Nominal ratio of height to width of the image of an axis-aligned
square captured by the camera sensor. It can be used to de-squeeze
images but is not however an exact number over the entire captured
area due to a lens' intrinsic analog nature.

firmwareVersion.description: Non-blank string identifying camera firmware version

label.description: Non-blank string containing user-determined camera identifier

serialNumber.description: Non-blank string uniquely identifying the camera

captureFrameRate.description: Capture frame rate of the camera

fdlLink.description: URN identifying the ASC Framing Decision List used by the camera.

isoSpeed.description: Arithmetic ISO scale as defined in ISO 12232

shutterAngle.description:
Shutter speed as a fraction of the capture frame rate. The shutter
speed (in units of 1/s) is equal to the value of the parameter divided
by 360 times the capture frame rate.
